resources.string: G-Box MX4 info
When you allow data roaming, you may incur significant roaming charges!\n\nThis setting affects all users on this G-Box MX4.
Encrypt G-Box MX4
Require a numeric PIN or password to decrypt your G-Box MX4 each time you power it on

You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. Once you encrypt your G-Box MX4, you need to type a numeric PIN or password to decrypt it each time you power it on. You can\'t decrypt your G-Box MX4 except by performing a factory data reset, erasing all your data.\n\nEncryption takes an hour or more. You must keep your G-Box MX4 plugged in until encryption is complete. If you interrupt the encryption process, you will lose some or all of your data.
Encrypt G-Box MX4
The encryption operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you\'ll lose data. Encryption takes an hour or more, during which the G-Box MX4 will restart several times.

Encryption was interrupted and can\'t complete. As a result, the data on your G-Box MX4 is no longer accessible. \n\n To resume using your G-Box MX4, you need to perform a factory reset. When you set up your G-Box MX4 after the reset, you\'ll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account.
Allow data exchange when the G-Box MX4 touches another device
To complete setup, your G-Box MX4 needs access to Wi-Fi. After setup, you can switch between mobile data and Wi-Fi.
WARNING: You may incur extra carrier data charges.\n\nG-Box MX4 setup can require significant network activity.
WARNING: The G-Box MX4 won\'t be able to verify that your software is up to date.
The G-Box MX4 was unable to connect to this Wi-Fi network.
G-Box MX4 not docked
You need to dock the G-Box MX4 before setting up dock audio.
Play sound when inserting or removing G-Box MX4 from dock
Switch orientation automatically when rotating G-Box MX4
Switch orientation automatically when rotating G-Box MX4
G-Box MX4 status
Erases all data on G-Box MX4

"This will erase all data from your G-Box MX4's internal storage, including:


Your Google account

System and app data and settings

Downloaded apps"
Reset G-Box MX4
Let apps use GPS on your G-Box MX4 to pinpoint your location
About G-Box MX4

Your G-Box MX2 and personal data are more vulnerable to attack by apps from unknown sources. You agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to your G-Box MX4 or loss of data that may result from using these apps.
This app can access the following on your G-Box MX4:
Move to G-Box MX4
If you stop this service, some features of your G-Box MX4 may stop working correctly until you power it off and then on again.
G-Box MX4 information
G-Box MX4 idle
G-Box MX4
Reset G-Box MX4
Removing this account will delete all of its messages, contacts, and other data from the G-Box MX4!
This account is required by some apps. You can only remove it by resetting the G-Box MX4 to factory defaults (which deletes all your personal data) in Settings > Backup & reset.

Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your G-Box MX4.

Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on the G-Box MX4 to the web. A Google Account works this way.

To choose which kinds of information to sync within each account, go to Settings > Accounts.
This user\'s space and data will disappear from this G-Box MX4. You can\'t undo this action.
This setting affects all users on this G-Box MX4.
